page.title: 09 Shop Survey , West Stafford
page.content: We want to compare a large and a small food chain store, so we interviewed the manager and ten shoppers at both shops. We found that in the small food shop that Saturday was busiest. There were 14,000 customers per week. They change the products according to demand.There are 24 assistants.At this convenient shop,40% of the customers go daily,60% buy branded goods. At the large foods store Thursday to Saturday was the busiest. They had 20,000 customers per week.They change products when they are told by Head Office.180 assistants are employed.This shop is liked for quality .Half of the customers go twice weekly. Most peolple buy any brand,fresh or frozen.Both shops are busiest between 5-7pm and at Christmas.
